title: The magic of non-verbal hypnosis / Dr Paret
description:
The magic of non-verbal hypnosis with Dr Paret. Non-verbal techniques are unique and deeply transformative. Non-verbal hypnosis is the basis for stronger and more effective hypnosis. In our school we develop unique non-verbal techniques that permit to reach the deepest self.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
